mrvaidya:

For an alien with a spaceship, the Doctor sure spends a lot of time chasing people on foot.

Well it wouldnât be very fun if you just chased after them in the spaceship, would it? :D

I get that it’s an old, broken-down spacecraft held together by string and chewing gum at this point, but you’d think he’d take a week off to figure out some way to make the TARDIS to teleport itself over to his location, given that we already know how to do this. Furthermore, while I get that the TARDIS is only supposed to be the doorway into the episode and then it goes away (sometimes literally), I (1) wish that wasn’t so, and (2) that’s just barely fine when you have a really good episode, but its annoying when used too often. Of course there is the rare episode where using the TARDIS, either for time or space travel, would just make things worse, but … I don’t know. Maybe I expect too much from writers.
